attributes.action: Permit holders should park free anywhere in the borough where permit is issued.
attributes.additional_details:
# Permit Holders in any borough of UK should be able to use the permit they have paid for to park free in the Borough they live in.  For example if you live in the London Borough of Newham, you purchase a permit for your road you live on your car is displaying through the permit you live inside the borough then you should be able to park free anywhere inside the Borough for where your permit was issued. making the public poor and the boroughs getting rich with our money.
# one less thing to worry about when you go shopping or banking looking for change for parking.
